mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO anchor(nickname, img, author_id, gender, `level`, fans, url, category, goods, sales , introduce, live, live_day, `view`, avg_dur, rate, avg_gmv, price, score) VALUES
(#{anchor.nickname}, #{anchor.img}, #{anchor.authorId}, #{anchor.gender}, #{anchor.level}, #{anchor.fans}, #{anchor.url}, #{anchor.category}, #{anchor.goods}, #{anchor.sales}, #{anchor.introduce}, #{anchor.live}, #{anchor.liveDay}, #{anchor.view}, #{anchor.avgDur}, #{anchor.rate}, #{anchor.avgGmv}, #{anchor.price}, #{anchor.score})
